title: Downtown Berkeley ** 2 blocks to UC Berkeley, furnished, free utilitie
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE NOW.', '2-12 month lease available (single resident occupancy)', '++ Private rooms available with private entrance', '++ Fully furnished room with bed, desk, chair, shelves, closet', '++ All utilities included!', 'WIFI, water, electricity, garbage included!', '++ 2 blocks from campus and 2 blocks from Bart.', 'AMAZING location!', '++ Several private bathrooms on each floor shared with floormates, professionally cleaned', '++ No kitchens in building, but each unit includes mini-fridge and microwave.', '++ Walk to dozens of restaurants, cafes, coffee shops, stores, just downstairs of our building', '++ Quiet, courteous tenants only.', 'Onsite manager 24/7.', 'Short term rental OK!', 'Room with shared bathrooms:', '12-month lease: $1050 per month', '6-11 month lease: $1125 per month', '2-5 month lease: $1250 per month', 'Room with private bathroom:', '12-month lease: $1375 per month', '6-11 month lease: $1450 per month', '2-5 month lease: $1500 per month', 'Several units available, please call manager Ms. Kathy for showing.', "If she doesn't answer, leave a clear message.", 'No text messages.', 'This is an office landline.', 'Thank you and stay safe!', 'show contact info', 'Ms Kathy.']
